languages.text: {n}Джай активно кивает.{/n} "О да, шерин, и вот что я думаю: со дня нашего знакомства меня штормило из стороны в сторону, словно шлюпку средь бушующего океана. Трепало, било о скалы, захлестывало с головой... И вот выбросило на берег, вручив напоследок еще и великий дар — драгоценную жемчужину из глубин, Меркатум Табула Официале". {n}Джай останавливается, дабы перевести дух.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай активно кивает.{/n} "О да, шерин, и вот что я думаю: со дня нашего знакомства меня штормило из стороны в сторону, словно шлюпку средь бушующего океана. Трепало, било о скалы, захлестывало с головой... И вот выбросило на берег, вручив напоследок еще и великий дар — драгоценную жемчужину из глубин, Меркатум табула Официале". {n}Джай останавливается, дабы перевести дух.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae gives a vigorous nod.{/n} "Oh yes, shereen, and here is what I think: since the day we first met, I have been tossed about like a boat in a storm. Battered, dashed against the rocks, lashed by the waves... And then I was flung onto the shore, and a fabulous gift washed up beside me — a precious pearl of the deep, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale." {n}Jae pauses to catch her breath.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Джай активно кивает.{/n} "О да, шерин, и вот что я думаю: со дня нашего знакомства меня штормило из стороны в сторону, словно шлюпку средь бушующего океана. Трепало, било о скалы, захлестывало с головой... И вот выбросило на берег, вручив напоследок еще и великий дар — драгоценную жемчужину из глубин, Меркатум Табула Официале". {n}Джай останавливается, дабы перевести дух.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae gives a vigorous nod.{/n} "Oh yes, shereen, and here is what I think: since the day we first met I was being tossed about like a boat in a stormy ocean. Roughhoused, tossed against the rocks, beaten by the waves... And then it threw me on the shore, leaving behind a gift of tremendous value — a precious peal of the deep, Mercatum Tabula Officiale." {n}Jae pauses to catch her breath.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}婕伊用力点了点头。{/n}“噢，是啊，亲爱的。我是这么想的——自从我们第一次见面开始，我就像暴风雨中的小船一样，被风雨摧残，被吹向礁石，被海浪拍打……随后，我被甩到了岸上，一份美妙的礼物冲到了我的身边。那是来自深海的宝贵珍珠，是帝国官方的行商执照。”{n}婕伊顿了顿，喘了口气。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives a vigorous nod.{/n} "Oh yes, shereen, and here is what I think: since the day we first met, I have been tossed about like a boat in a storm. Battered, dashed against the rocks, lashed by the waves... And then I was flung onto the shore, and a fabulous gift washed up beside me — a precious pearl of the deep, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale." {n}Jae pauses to catch her breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊用力点了点头。{/n}“噢，是啊，亲爱的。我是这么想的——自从我们第一次见面开始，我就像暴风雨中的小船一样，被风雨摧残，被吹向礁石，被海浪拍打……随后，我被甩到了岸上，一份美妙的礼物冲到了我的身边。那是来自深海的宝贵珍珠，是帝国官方的行商执照。”{n}婕伊顿了顿，喘了口气。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives a vigorous nod.{/n} "Oh yes, shereen, and here is what I think: since the day we first met, I have been tossed about like a boat in a storm. Battered, dashed against the rocks, lashed by the waves... And then I was flung onto the shore, and a fabulous gift washed up beside me — a precious pearl of the deep, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale." {n}Jae pauses to catch her breath.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae asiente con vigor.{/n} «Ah, sí, shereen, esto es lo que opino: el día que nos conocimos, quedé zarandeada como a un barco en una tormenta. Empujada, golpeada contra las rocas, azotada por las olas... y después llegué a la costa, y un regalo increíble apareció a mi lado en la arena: una valiosísima perla de las profundidades, la Mercatum Tabula Officiale». {n}Jae hace una pausa para tomar aliento.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives a vigorous nod.{/n} "Oh yes, shereen, and here is what I think: since the day we first met, I have been tossed about like a boat in a storm. Battered, dashed against the rocks, lashed by the waves... And then I was flung onto the shore, and a fabulous gift washed up beside me — a precious pearl of the deep, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale." {n}Jae pauses to catch her breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae asiente con vigor.{/n} «Ah, sí, shereen, esto es lo que opino: el día que nos conocimos, quedé zarandeada como a un barco en una tormenta. Empujada, golpeada contra las rocas, azotada por las olas... y después llegué a la costa, y un regalo increíble apareció a mi lado en la arena: una valiosísima perla de las profundidades, la Mercatum Tabula Officiale». {n}Jae hace una pausa para tomar aliento.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイは力強くうなずいた。{/n}「ええ、そうね、シャリーン。ここがあたしの思っていた場所。初めて会った日から、あたしは嵐の中のボートのように翻弄されてきたわ。打ちのめされ、岩にぶつかり、波にもまれ…そして岸に打ち上げられて、素晴らしい贈り物があたしのそばに流れ着いた…貴重な深海の真珠、メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルが」{n}ジェイは呼吸を整える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives a vigorous nod.{/n} "Oh yes, shereen, and here is what I think: since the day we first met, I have been tossed about like a boat in a storm. Battered, dashed against the rocks, lashed by the waves... And then I was flung onto the shore, and a fabulous gift washed up beside me — a precious pearl of the deep, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale." {n}Jae pauses to catch her breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは力強くうなずいた。{/n}「ええ、そうね、シャリーン。ここがあたしの思っていた場所。初めて会った日から、あたしは嵐の中のボートのように翻弄されてきたわ。打ちのめされ、岩にぶつかり、波にもまれ…そして岸に打ち上げられて、素晴らしい贈り物があたしのそばに流れ着いた…貴重な深海の真珠、メルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルが」{n}ジェイは呼吸を整える。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae nickt energisch.{/n} "Oh ja, Shereen, und ich glaube Folgendes: Seit dem Tag, an dem wir uns begegnet sind, werde ich umhergewirbelt wie ein Boot in einem Sturm. Von den Wellen gepeitscht, gegen die Felsen geschleudert ... Und dann wurde ich ans Ufer geworfen, und ein wunderbares Geschenk wurde neben mir an Land gespült — eine wertvolle Perle aus der Tiefe, die Mercatum Tabula Officiale." {n}Jae hält kurz inne, um Atem zu holen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives a vigorous nod.{/n} "Oh yes, shereen, and here is what I think: since the day we first met, I have been tossed about like a boat in a storm. Battered, dashed against the rocks, lashed by the waves... And then I was flung onto the shore, and a fabulous gift washed up beside me — a precious pearl of the deep, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale." {n}Jae pauses to catch her breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae nickt energisch.{/n} "Oh ja, Shereen, und ich glaube Folgendes: Seit dem Tag, an dem wir uns begegnet sind, werde ich umhergewirbelt wie ein Boot in einem Sturm. Von den Wellen gepeitscht, gegen die Felsen geschleudert ... Und dann wurde ich ans Ufer geworfen, und ein wunderbares Geschenk wurde neben mir an Land gespült — eine wertvolle Perle aus der Tiefe, die Mercatum Tabula Officiale." {n}Jae hält kurz inne, um Atem zu holen.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae hoche la tête vigoureusement.{/n} « Oh oui, shereen, et voilà ce que mes réflexions m'ont permis d'établir : depuis le jour de notre rencontre, j'ai été ballotée dans tous les sens comme un navire en pleine tempête. Malmenée, fracassée contre les rochers, fouettée par les vagues... Puis j'ai été rejetée sur le rivage, et un fabuleux cadeau s'est échoué à côté de moi : cette précieuse perle des profondeurs qu'est la Mercatum Tabula Officiale. » {n}Elle s'interrompt pour reprendre son souffle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives a vigorous nod.{/n} "Oh yes, shereen, and here is what I think: since the day we first met, I have been tossed about like a boat in a storm. Battered, dashed against the rocks, lashed by the waves... And then I was flung onto the shore, and a fabulous gift washed up beside me — a precious pearl of the deep, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale." {n}Jae pauses to catch her breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae hoche la tête vigoureusement.{/n} « Oh oui, shereen, et voilà ce que mes réflexions m'ont permis d'établir : depuis le jour de notre rencontre, j'ai été ballotée dans tous les sens comme un navire en pleine tempête. Malmenée, fracassée contre les rochers, fouettée par les vagues... Puis j'ai été rejetée sur le rivage, et un fabuleux cadeau s'est échoué à côté de moi : cette précieuse perle des profondeurs qu'est la Mercatum Tabula Officiale. » {n}Elle s'interrompt pour reprendre son souffle.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae hevesle onaylıyor.{/n} "Aynen öyle şirinim. Şöyle düşünüyorum: Karşılaştığımız günden beri fırtınaya yakalanmış bir gemi gibi bir o yana bir bu yana savruluyorum. Yıprandım, kayalara vuruyorum, dalgalarca kırbaçlanıyorum. Sonra bir kıyıya fırlatılıyorum, benimle birlikte çok değerli bir hazine de kıyıya vuruyor: Derinlerden gelen bir inci, Mercatum Tabula Officiale." {n}Jae, nefesini toplamak için biraz duraksıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae gives a vigorous nod.{/n} "Oh yes, shereen, and here is what I think: since the day we first met, I have been tossed about like a boat in a storm. Battered, dashed against the rocks, lashed by the waves... And then I was flung onto the shore, and a fabulous gift washed up beside me — a precious pearl of the deep, the Mercatum Tabula Officiale." {n}Jae pauses to catch her breath.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae hevesle onaylıyor.{/n} "Aynen öyle şirinim. Şöyle düşünüyorum: Karşılaştığımız günden beri fırtınaya yakalanmış bir gemi gibi bir o yana bir bu yana savruluyorum. Yıpranmış durumdayım, kayalara vuruyorum, dalgalarca kırbaçlanıyorum. Sonra bir kıyıya fırlatılıyorum ve kıyıya benimle birlikte çok değerli bir hazine de vuruyor. Derinlerden gelen bir inci, Mercatum Tabula Officiale." {n}Jae nefesini toplamak için biraz duraksıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
